yaml.title: Jerin's Blog
yaml.author: Jerin Jacob
yaml.desription: This is a blog about Jerin Jacob. It talks about the professional experience, education and personal interests of Jerin.

markdown.markdown: I am Jerin Jacob. I was an entrepreneur for 5 years and a marketer for 11 years. I worked in retail, IT industry, car rental, contracting, ecommerce and consulting. When I understood the importance of data, I decided to do a Master's program in Data Science. The Data Analytics and Computational Social Science program gives me the state of the art data science skills to bridge the business world and technology with a social science perspective. This unique combination of skill sets and experience makes me the ideal candidate to help organizations solve problems with well informed, data driven decision making.
